text: Again in February my computer completely failed to the point that it could not load Windows so I contacted Acer to get it fixed thru my Warrenty and it took about 3 days fighting on the phone with agents and it seemed as though NONE of them spoke English .
Treat yourself to a more expensive , long-lasting laptop of quality like a Sony , Apple , or Toshiba .
Dealing with the support drone on the other end of the chat was sheer torture .
Love the graphics , awesome programs ( including Garageband ) , and really cool default background .
I did think it had a camera because that was one of my requirements , but forgot to check in the specifications on this one before I purchased .
Upgrading from Windows 7 Starter , thru Windows 7 Home Premium , to Windows 7 Professional was a snap ;
First the screen goes completely out .
My computer froze on several occasion , had buttons that randomely would fall off and even had moments when the computer would refuse to turn on at all .
We love the size of the screen , although it is still lightweight and very easy to tote around .
Would like more trendy , high tech features .
It is a much more streamlined system for adding programs , using the internet , and doing other things everyone does on a computer .
A longer battery life would have been great - but it meets it 's spec quite easily .
I do transcription work on the side , and the flatline keyboard makes typing quick and easy as well .
When you look at the specs on Apple products in comparison to a Dell or a HP , yes they do seem to offer less for a higher cost .
They replaced my hard drive as well as my mother board .
